name: I Deal Ideals and Unideals
description:
DISCLAIMER:

I DO NOT CONDONE THE VIOLENCE OR MISTREATMENT OF ANYONE REGARDLESS OF RACE, GENDER, AGE, ABILITY, RELIGION, ETC. 

This game was made for a history project, and nothing more.

A game  where you sort people into 'ideal' people and 'unideal' people. This game is inspired by a quote by historian Richard Evans, "The songs they sang were Nazi songs. The books they read were Nazi books." As a result, I thought of a third thing to add to the list. "The games they played were Nazi games."
